https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ddpRizwxVpqRl01OhL3czyilUrz.jpg Johnson, the honourable son of a dreaded local thug, decides to erase the bad image of his father in the society. He becomes a police officer and fights to bring criminals to justice. Ben Johnson
